sql.query: INSERT INTO submission_settings (submission_id, setting_name, setting_value, setting_type) SELECT ps.submission_id, 'datePublished', ps.date_published, 'string' FROM published_submissions_tmp ps WHERE ps.date_published IS NOT NULL
UPDATE submission_settings SET submission_version = 1 WHERE submission_version IS NULL OR submission_version = 0
UPDATE author_settings SET submission_version = 1 WHERE submission_version IS NULL OR submission_version = 0
INSERT INTO submission_galley_files (galley_id, file_id) SELECT sg.galley_id, sg.file_id FROM submission_galleys_tmp sg WHERE sg.file_id IS NOT NULL
